functions.name: list
functions.description: Gets all messages in a folder.

functions.name: continueList
functions.description: Returns the next chunk of messages in a list. See :doc:`how-to/messageLists` for more information.

functions.name: getFull
functions.description: Returns a specified message, including all headers and MIME parts.

functions.name: update
functions.description: Marks or unmarks a message as read, flagged, or tagged.

read.description: Marks the message as read or unread.

flagged.description: Marks the message as flagged or unflagged.

tags.description: Sets the tags on the message. For a list of available tags, call the listTags method.

functions.name: move
functions.description: Moves messages to a specified folder.

parameters.name: messageIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the messages to move.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The folder to move the messages to.

functions.name: copy
functions.description: Copies messages to a specified folder.

parameters.name: messageIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the messages to copy.

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: The folder to copy the messages to.

functions.name: delete
functions.description: Deletes messages, or moves them to the trash folder.

parameters.name: messageIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the messages to delete.

parameters.name: skipTrash
parameters.description: If true, the message will be permanently deleted without warning the user. If false or not specified, it will be moved to the trash folder.

functions.name: archive
functions.description: Archives messages using the current settings.

parameters.name: messageIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the messages to archive.

functions.name: listTags
functions.description: Returns a list of tags that can be set on messages, and their human-friendly name, colour, and sort order.
